dk.itu.smds.android.bluetweet
Class AbstractBlueTweetConnection

java.lang.Object
  dk.itu.smds.android.bluetweet.AbstractBlueTweetConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAsyncBlueTweetConnection, SimpleConnection
public abstract class AbstractBlueTweetConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Abstract class for BlueTweet connections. A connection is an interaction with a remote device.

Author:
frza

setRemoteAgeTime

public void setRemoteAgeTime(long remoteAgeTime)
When the remote configuration is read, call this to set the remoteAgeTime. This will set also set the loadSince field.
